card

Class Card

  • java.lang.Object
    • card.Card
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Advance2NearestRailroad, Advance2NearestUtility, Advance2SqueezePlay, Advance2StCharlesPlace, Advance2StockExchange, April15TaxesDue, AssessedStreetRepairs, AssetsSeized, BargainBusiness, Chairperson, ConsultancyFee, DoctorsFee, ExcellentAccounting, ForeClosedPropertySale, GeneralRepairs, GetOutOfJail, GetRolling, GoBackSpace, GoToJail, HappyBirthday, HeyTaxi, HouseCondemned, Hurricane, Inherit, LoanMature, MardiGras, PropertyTax, RenovationSuccess, ReverseRent, SchoolFees, SocialMediaFail, SpecialOnlinePricing, TaxiWars, Tornado, ZeroDollarsDown

    public class Card
extends java.lang.Object
    This Class is a class that simply holds the fields String cardName, Player owner, int cardID, int typeID and boolean keepable for the instance of the class and has constructors, setters and getters for the fields specified above. It also has a applyCard method to be overridden by the subclasses in the hierarchy later on. Additionally, it also keeps toString method for its instances. Lastly, it has several look up methods to be used in its subclasses.
    Version:
    %I%, %G%
    Author:
    Berk Kaan Kuguoglu

      • advanceLookUp

        public void advanceLookUp(Player p,
                          Game g,
                          java.lang.String sq)
        Looks up a specific Square instance and moves the Player to the Square looked up.
        Parameters:
        p - the player who is going to look up
        g - the game instance that is being played
        sq - the name of the Square instance to be looked up
        Requires:
        sq is already created and it is placed on the board
        Modifies:
        p
        Effects:
        the Player p is moved to the Square sq

      • advanceLookUpRailroad

        public void advanceLookUpRailroad(Player p,
                                  Game g)
        Looks up a RailroadTrackSquare instance and moves the Player to the Square looked up.
        Parameters:
        p - the player who is going to look up
        g - the game instance that is being played
        Requires:
        there must be at least one RailroadTrackSquare instance on the board
        Modifies:
        p
        Effects:
        the Player p is moved to the nearest RailroadTrackSquare instance
